name: places/ChIJw59TrXVZwokRYOzRh94xFxE
formattedAddress: 110 W 40th St Suite 1102, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 110 W 40th St Suite 1102, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text:
While planning our wedding, the vendor that I spent the most time researching was photography, as I’m sure, many couples can relate to. I wanted our wedding photos to be something that I could look back on years from now and be able to relive that day, and I can honestly say that Dreamlife exceeded all of our expectations!

We had Ivan and Angelo for our photographers and we can’t say enough good things about them. Ivan captured so many unbelievable, wide-scale cinematic photos, while Angelo had an incredible talent for capturing the most beautiful detail photos!

Ivan was with me and my bridesmaids for “getting ready” photos. He captured the special moment of me seeing myself in the mirror for the first time as my mom and sister put my veil on, it is such a beautiful picture! He also captured the most stunning photo of our silhouettes with the sunset coming through my veil! These are just two examples of hundreds of incredible photos he took! All of these photos were so perfectly complimented by Angelo’s attention to detail and ability to capture the candid moments throughout our day! Angelo was with my husband for his getting ready photos, and the shots he got of my husband with his groomsmen perfectly captured their friendships. Throughout the day, he took so many photos of our flowers and menus, and programs, and signage, and it honestly made the hours of planning every last detail worth it because they are now perfectly preserved by his photos!

Once your wedding is over, the best problem is having too many good photos to choose from for your album! I HIGHLY recommend Dreamlife to capture your day, Ivan and Angelo could not have done a better job, we are so happy and cannot wait to see our wedding photos printed!

originalText.text: We had the absolute pleasure of having Cecelia with DreamLife photograph our wedding on 9/23. Cecelia was absolutely amazing. She was so detail oriented and had such an eye for capturing everything. My dad was so impressed. Even the guests were commenting how she was jumping in and grabbing every shot she could. She was so kind and made sure we got every shot we put on our shot list and more. DreamLife was recommended by a good friend of ours, her photos came out amazing and I just knew I had to have them do my wedding. My husband and I are so pleased with how our photos came out. Cecelia did amazing and we're so glad she was able to help us capture our special day.

Cecelia did amazing and we're so glad she was able to help us capture our special day.

originalText.text:
We do not have enough good things to say about Eddie and the whole Dreamlife team.

Booking was super easy, even though we had a unique ceremony set up. The scheduling team made the entire process seamless from start to finish.

Our photographer, Eddie, was an integral part of our wedding experience. From the moment he arrived he just clicked with our families. Both the mother of the bride and the mother of the groom asked for his contact information to reach out and thank him personally. He created a warm and fun environment that instantly made everyone feel comfortable. The images he captured are absolutely stunning. He felt like a guest that we were happy to have with us on our day, and we will treasure our photos forever.

Thank you, Eddie. We will be recommending you to everyone we know!

originalText.text: They are absolutely incredible! We had to postpone our wedding 3 times because of COVID and my family not being able to come here from Brazil, and the customer service was excellent! Sandy and Noemi were able to accommodate our requests without a problem and we were finally able to have our wedding in March 2023 and it was perfect! We had Angelo as our main photographer, he was so attentive to details, fun and super easy to work with. He kept reminding us about the photos we wanted that I even forgot about it in the middle of the super busy day lol Not to mention Ivan (our second photographer) and Slava (our videographer) that were absolutely AMAZING! We couldn’t be happier, thanks for capturing memories of a lifetime! Fernanda & Brian

originalText.text:
Dreamlife was a fantastic choice for our wedding day videography. Our videographer, Saul was incredibly kind and professional and made us feel so comfortable on our big day. Saul was excellent at coordinating us and our guests for video footage and captured everything so beautifully from the beginning of the day all the way through reception.

Dreamlife in general was very easy to work with, and the turnaround time on our highlight real and wedding day footage was great. We definitely recommend them to anyone getting married in the New York area!
